import React, { useState } from 'react' import Sidebar from '../../components/Admin/Sidebar' import Topbar from '../../components/Admin/TopBar' import Footer from '../../components/Admin/Footer' import Product from '../../pages/views/Admin/Products' import DetailProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/DetailProduct' import AddForm from '../../pages/views/Admin/AddForm' import EditProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/EditProduct' import dataFake from '../../dataFake'; import '../../assets/css/admin/sb-admin-2.min.scss' import '../../assets/css/admin/main.scss' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default ({ children }) => { const [products, setproducts] = useState(dataFake); const removeElement = (id) => { console.log(id); const newData = products.filter(product => product.id !== id); console.log(newData); setproducts(newData); } const onHandleAdd = (product) => { console.log(product); setproducts([ ...products, product ]) } return (
Home page
) }
